TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidatePasswordEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ValidatePasswordEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class ValidatePasswordEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 类的 事件提供事件数据。

span.span: Provides event data for the event of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时， ，或调用的成员资格提供程序方法。The event is raised when the , , or method of a membership provider is called. 你可以处理事件来验证密码格式和的成员资格用户的值。You can handle the event to validate password formats and values for membership users. 你可以取消当前， ，或通过设置的操作属性`true`期间事件。You can cancel the current , , or action by setting the property to `true` during the event. 如果通过设置取消当前操作属性`true`，你可以设置属性描述密码验证失败的原因的异常。If you cancel the current action by setting the property to `true`, you can set the property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 调用的方法将引发异常，属性设置为。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果属性是`null`，调用方将引发一般密码验证失败异常。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件，用于验证用户的密码的格式并取消操作，如果密码不匹配所需的格式。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.Membership#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/CS/CreateUser3cs.aspx#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.Membership#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/VB/CreateUser3vb.aspx#11)]

Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数使用通过中的成员资格提供程序实现， ，和方法实现。The constructor is used by a membership provider implementation in the , , and method implementations. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了一个示例创建一个新的实现要传递给对象事件。The following code example shows a sample implementation that creates a new object to pass to the event. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将取消当前的创建用户、更改密码或重置密码操作。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled.

value.span: 如果将取消当前的创建用户、更改密码或重置密码操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current create-user, change-password, or reset-password action will be canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于取消当前， ，或操作。The property is used to cancel the current , , or action. 你可以通过设置取消当前操作属性`true`期间事件。You can cancel the current action by setting the property to `true` during the event. 如果通过设置取消当前操作属性`true`，你可以设置属性描述密码验证失败的原因的异常。If you cancel the current action by setting the property to `true`, you can set the property to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 调用的方法将引发异常，属性设置为。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果属性是`null`，调用方将引发一般密码验证失败异常。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件，用于验证用户的密码的格式并取消操作，如果密码不匹配所需的格式。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.Membership#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/CS/CreateUser3cs.aspx#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.Membership#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/VB/CreateUser3vb.aspx#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性时当前， ，或操作已取消通过设置属性`true`。The property is used when the current , , or action has been canceled by setting the property to `true`. 属性设置为描述密码验证失败的原因的异常。The property is set to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 调用的方法将引发异常，属性设置为。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果属性是`null`，调用方将引发一般密码验证失败异常。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation failure exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件，用于验证用户的密码的格式并取消操作，如果密码不匹配所需的格式。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for the user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
